CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BigBear.ai Holdings Inc is engaged in decision dominance serving the national defense and intelligence communities. It operationalizes artificial intelligence and machine learning at scale through its end-to-end data analytics platform. The company uses its proprietary AI/ML technology to support its customer's decision-making processes and deliver practical solutions that work in complex, realistic, and imperfect data environments.
